meta.title_zh: 促銷活動：買一送一、第二件半價

dialogue.zh:
嗨! 可以 我 幫忙 你?
こんにちは! できます 私 手伝う あなた?

dialogue.text: Yes, I saw a buy-one-get-one deal.
dialogue.zh:
是的, 我 saw a buy-one-get-one deal.
はい, 私 saw a buy-one-get-one deal.

當然. Which product?
もちろん. Which product?

This shampoo.
This shampoo.

dialogue.text: Yes, it’s buy one, get one free.
dialogue.zh:
是的, it’s buy one, get one free.
はい, it’s buy one, get one free.

太好了.
いいですね.

dialogue.text: Does it apply to any size?
dialogue.zh:
Does it apply to 任何 size?
Does it apply to any size?

Only the 500ml size.
Only the 500ml size.

好的, 我’ll take two.
わかりました, 私’ll take two.

Perfect.
Perfect.

你 可以 mix different scents.
あなた できます mix different scents.

dialogue.text: Really? Then I’ll get one lavender and one mint.
dialogue.zh:
Really? Then 我’ll get one lavender and one mint.
Really? Then 私’ll get one lavender and one mint.

Good choice.
Good choice.

謝謝.
ありがとう.

dialogue.text: Anything else on promotion you want to check?
dialogue.zh:
Anything else on promotion 你 想要 to check?
Anything else on promotion あなた want to check?

dialogue.text: Is there a discount on toothpaste?
dialogue.zh:
是 那裡 a 折扣 on toothpaste?
私 there a 割引 on toothpaste?

dialogue.text: Toothpaste is second item half price.
dialogue.zh:
Toothpaste 是 second item half 價格.
Toothpaste 私 second item half 値段.

Nice.
Nice.

dialogue.text: Do you want the same brand?
dialogue.zh:
你 想要 the same brand?
Do あなた want the same brand?

是的, the same brand.
はい, the same brand.

dialogue.text: Then grab two to get the discount.
dialogue.zh:
Then grab two to get the 折扣.
Then grab two to get the 割引.

好的.
わかりました.

dialogue.text: Do you have a store membership card?
dialogue.zh:
你 有 a 店 會員 卡?
Do あなた have a 店 会員 カード?

不, 我 don’t.
いいえ, 私 don’t.

dialogue.text: No worries, the promotion still applies.
dialogue.zh:
不 worries, the promotion still applies.
いいえ worries, the promotion still applies.

太好了.
いいですね.

dialogue.text: You can pay at self-checkout or the cashier.
dialogue.zh:
你 可以 pay at self-結帳 or the cashier.
あなた できます pay at self-レジ or the cashier.

我’ll use the cashier.
私’ll use the cashier.

Alright, 有 a good one.
Alright, have a good one.

謝謝!
ありがとう!
